com.linecorp.armeria.server

Interface Router<V>


  • public interface Router<V>
    Finds a mapping that matches a given PathMappingContext.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dump(OutputStream output)
      Dumps the content of this Router.
      PathMapped<V> find(PathMappingContext mappingCtx)
      Finds the value of mapping that matches the specified PathMappingContext.
      default boolean registerMetrics(MeterRegistry registry, MeterIdPrefix idPrefix)
      Registers the stats of this Router to the specified MeterRegistry.

    • Method Detail

      • find

        PathMapped<V> find(PathMappingContext mappingCtx)
        Finds the value of mapping that matches the specified PathMappingContext.
        Returns:
        a PathMapped that wraps the matching value if there's a match. PathMapped.empty() if there's no match.

      • registerMetrics

        default boolean registerMetrics(MeterRegistry registry,
                                MeterIdPrefix idPrefix)
        Registers the stats of this Router to the specified MeterRegistry.
        Returns:
        whether the stats of this Router has been registered

      • dump

        void dump(OutputStream output)
        Dumps the content of this Router.
